datasets.title: MNIST Handwritten Digits
datasets.description: 70,000 images of handwritten digits (0-9) in 28x28 grayscale format

datasets.title: IMDb Movie Reviews
datasets.description: 50,000 movie reviews labeled by sentiment for natural language processing

datasets.title: Boston Housing
datasets.description: 506 samples of housing prices in Boston suburbs with 13 features

datasets.title: Iris Flower Dataset
datasets.description: 150 samples of iris flowers with 4 features for species classification
